// Original Type: Server.Items.Longsword

using System;
using Server;
using Server.Items;

namespace Server.Items
{
    public class GeneratedLongsword : Longsword
    {
        // Change this name to customize the item name
        private static readonly string ItemName = "Legendary Sword";

        [Constructable]
        public GeneratedLongsword()
            : base()
        {
            Name = ItemName;
            Hue = 0x489;
            LootType = LootType.Blessed;
            Weight = 7.0;
            MinDamage = 15;
            MaxDamage = 30;
            Speed = 35;
            Slayer = SlayerName.DragonSlaying;
            WeaponAttributes = new WeaponAttributes();
            WeaponAttributes.HitLightning = 50;
            WeaponAttributes.SelfRepair = 5;
            Attributes = new AosAttributes();
            Attributes.AttackChance = 15;
            Attributes.DefendChance = 10;
            Attributes.WeaponDamage = 50;
            Attributes.WeaponSpeed = 25;
        }

        public GeneratedLongsword(Serial serial)
            : base(serial)
        {
        }

        public override void Serialize(GenericWriter writer)
        {
            base.Serialize(writer);
            writer.Write((int)0); // version
        }

        public override void Deserialize(GenericReader reader)
        {
            base.Deserialize(reader);
            int version = reader.ReadInt();
        }
    }
}
